page.title: 11CHILDREN'S GAMES IN WALES
page.content: {SCHOOL}In the playground we play at catch,hide and seek,marbles or french skipping.We call french skipping "elastic".The infants often play at "mums and dads","cops and robbers" and other police games. {OUTDOORS}At home we play at football or rounders.Nowadays BMX bikes are very popular. They are used for stunts in competitions.Outside we often play at "tiggy","kerby","hot rice" and hop- scotch.These games are very simple. {INDOORS}We play at hide and seek. We also play at "I-spy"and board games like Ludo,Snakes and ladders and Monopoly.Girls like to play with "My Little ponies", which are small coloured pony toys with names to match the colours, eg:Cotton Candy is a pink colour.Girls also play with dolls. Two popular dolls are "Cabbage patch kids" and Sindy dolls.Computers are popular.
